attributes.title: Photos gone 😿😿
attributes.review: If I could give 0 stars I’d give it no hesitation 🤬🤬 I’m outraged. This app has taken up 90% of my storage and on top of that my phone has starting freezing after downloading it. I went to go look at my camera roll and every single picture is deleted and the cause is this app. I remember the app asking for access to my photos, so me being me I clicked accept. Years worth of photos down the drain... such a waste and I’m very upset 🤬🤬 becareful downloading this, Bc your photos will get stolen and deleted 😿😿

attributes.title: Would leave 0 stars if I could. TRUMP 2020!!
attributes.review:
This app is awful!!! I tried using this app to keep up to date with the new facist regime (my family lineage is Italian and Austrian, facism is my HERITAGE) and the app kept crashing and making my phone do weird stuff. HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO STAY UP TO DATE WITH THE COMING OF THE NEW NEw OrDER WITH A BROKEN APP, THANKS OBAMA. I can’t wait until this app is FIXED, and we can finally become great and follow China’s lead in destroying nations and suppressing our people. I hate having freedom of speech, democracy, AND basic human rights! If you hate the future vote TRUMP 2020!!!

🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊

attributes.title: Very disappointing
attributes.review: Hello all! Just wanted to write this review to discuss how ATROCIOUS this app is. It’s very slow and is extremely flawed with its messages. It needs to be taken off of the App Store IMMEDIATELY because many of the images on the page are quite disturbing. As soon as you open said app, in fact, one of these completely inappropriate pictures pop up it’s very disturbing and frankly, very hard on anybody’s eyesight. It is what seems to be a orange with a wig on. Nobody should have to see that offensive imagery anywhere :) have a blessed day

attributes.title: I HAD THE WORST TIME ON THIS APP! 🤮🍊🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review:
All I wanted out of this app was to keep up with our president 🇺🇸, but what people DONT ❌ tell you is it’s actually a horror 😱 game! I was shocked 😱.As soon as you open the app📱, a really fat 🤮, wrinkly, stale cheeto looks RIGHT AT YOU 😳!! It nearly put me in the ER 🏨!! I did more research, and found a quote from a very reliable source!

“Downloading this app has side-effects like a decrease in common sense, an increase in appetite, a higher risk for really bad spray tans, and DEATH!! PROCEED WITH CAUTION!!”

Long story short, this app is the worst I’ve ever downloaded and should be REMOVED from EXISTENCE!! 😤

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: My friend told me how amazing this app was and bc I love my 🍊president I download it. It took 7 hours to download and once it finally did my dead dog had come back to life and SLAPPED my phone out of my hand. I was confused so I ran upstairs but when I got to the top I saw the president standing there he pushed me down the stairs😭✨ once I finally stopped rolling the beloved president 🍊had jumped down the stairs and landed on me crushing me like a bug 🐛 he proceeded to kick me, jump on me, yelled racist slurs at me, spit on me and finally he picked me up and slammed my head into the wall.👁👄👁

attributes.title: Worst App Ever.
attributes.review: All opinions about Donald Trump aside, this app is awful. Plenty of other people have mentioned the bugs, glitches, and other mechanical concepts wrong with the app, and they’re true. The app took 4 hours to download, which is ridiculous. Once it finally downloaded, I couldn’t even spend a full minute on the app without it crashing. Not to mention how confusing and unusable the layout is. I couldn’t figure out how to do anything on it. For the love of god just remove this app from the appstore, it’s too far gone.

attributes.title: Toddler President👁👄👁
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to see if it passed the vibe check. When downloading this app my phone glitched so bad that it threw itself out the window and now I’m dead from how bad this app is💀the app has fail the vibe check🤢 it only made me realize that your president is a man baby with very tiny hands👶🏻that can’t hold a glass of water or walk properly.🚶🏽‍♂️I also wanted to see what trumps make up routine was only to find out it was Cheetos dust🟠 on his face which is not a vibe❌💅🏽
My evidence-𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣
I rest my case➖👄➖

attributes.title: POWER TO BRAINWASH
attributes.review: I downloaded the app wondering why the orange man is beloved by so many. ✨✨✨Then I realized it’s because of 5G, you see many do not read the fine print. But I,🧑🏼‍💻 as an educated college/high school student, decided to read like so many of us were taught at school.📖 Apparently if paired with 5G it has the power to brain wash the user. 🤯Thank god I had 4G, Other wise I would have turned into a sheep 🐑🐑that closes its eyes 🙈and ears 🙉to all criticism of THE ORANGE. 🍊🍊🍊Unfortunately I cannot vote this year... 3 months too young 😔😢 but I will still do my part 🥰❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🖤🤎

attributes.title: Worst Mistakes Of My LIFE!!
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch SO MUCH that i had to power it off in order for it to calm down. When i open the app it either kicks me out of turns off my phone completely. If i do get it to work, it soooo slowww. I just want to support our president but this is just disgraceful. Such a slap in the face that they release something that just harms my phone. I’m honestly just insulted. I’m deleting this for the sake of my PHONE’S LIFE. Please do not download this if you plan on keeping your phone. Mine is completely messed up now.

attributes.title: This app killed my friend
attributes.review: This app killed my friend!!😡 I downloaded this app because I wanted to see what all the talk was about, and a few days later me and my friend had a sleepover and as soon as I showed her that app she took it into her hands to go to the bathroom and hang herself with toilet paper, I know what your thinking this may not me possible but my friend is equivalent to a dried up noodle. And honestly this app glitches my phone soooooooo bad. So if your reading this this app is the worst app never get it unless you want your friend too die✨🤍🧚🏻‍♀️
